title: Wards are free.....
body: Yet this season i see one or two placed every f**king game..... How can you expect to win if you blindsided the whole game?

replies.body:
Pssh who needs wards.......
They take soooo much work. 
Like you have to waste like 2 secs of your time to place one.
Like what do wards even do. 
All I want to do is farm all game and kill scrubs 
Like I thought this was solo queue not help your teams the  game 

What it's like being bronze :3
Bronze players have an average of 4.76 wards a game.
